name: generate-classes
description: Generate cesium-native C++ classes from a JSON schema

scripts.test-3d-tiles: node index.js --schema https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CesiumGS/3d-tiles/3d-tiles-next/specification/schema/tileset.schema.json --output test_output/Cesium3DTiles --readerOutput test_output/Cesium3DTilesReader --writerOutput test_output/Cesium3DTilesWriter --extensions https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CesiumGS/3d-tiles/3d-tiles-next/extensions/ --namespace Cesium3DTiles --config 3dTiles.json
scripts.test-gltf: node index.js --schema https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CesiumGS/glTF/3d-tiles-next/specification/2.0/schema/glTF.schema.json --output test_output/CesiumGltf --readerOutput test_output/CesiumGltfReader --writerOutput test_output/CesiumGltfWriter --extensions https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CesiumGS/glTF/3d-tiles-next/extensions/2.0/ --namespace CesiumGltf --config glTF.json

author: CesiumGS, Inc.
